fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.TurnAction

Packages that use TurnAction
Package
Description
fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players
This package contains all elements defining the players, their possible actions within the game and the notifications they can send towards the view level of the MVC architecture.
fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.cpustrategies
This package's purpose is to propose an all-in-one set of tools used to define CPU-controlled players' artificial intelligences,
